title: Amazon posts largest profit in its history
text:
Amazon posts largest profit in its history Friday, February 02, 2018 - 01:34 
Amazon.com reports a profit near $2 billion, the largest in its history, as the world's largest online retailer draws millions of new customers to its Prime fast-shipping club for the holiday season and as changes to U.S. tax law added to its bottom line. Ciara Lee reports.
